REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2055 reute d f BC-BELL-ATLANTIC-<BEL>-U 04-13 0055

TEXT.TITLE: BELL ATLANTIC <BEL> UNIT IN DISTRIBUTION DEAL
TEXT.BODY: Bell Atlantic Corp's CompuShop subsidiary said it has been named an authorized reseller of Xerox Corp's <XRX> Xerox Ventura Publisher desktop publishing software for International Business Machines Corp's <IBM> XT and AT personal computers and compatibles. Reuter
